StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc1988
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
select recrui.ng_role_id as Recrui.ngRoleId, long_descrip.on as LongDescrip.on, short_descrip.on as ShortDescrip.on from mcriss.dbo.recrui.ng_role where produc.on_billet = 'Y' order by short_descrip.on FOR XML PATH('Billet'), ROOT('Billets')
